trends: There have been no other sightings in Washburn Mo
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsthe last several nights i have observed and reported on two objects in our night sky. this unusual because useually just one hangs out in our local sky with any regualarity. the first two nights larger of two objects appeared to firing beams of light at a object that was below our visable horizon. i never did see that object, i just assumed there was something or someone to shoot at or why would they be doing this. last two nights both objects have been hanging out in western sky. nothing appears to be going on these two nights. They have not been firing lights at anything at least. not sure why larger of two objects is hanging out, unless they are expecting the other unseen object back for some reason. this lasts from 3 to 4 hours and larger craft leaves about nine pm cst. it can be observed descemding below our visable horizon. while our local sometimes joins it. dont know whats going on but i will keep an eye on the sky for now and report anything else going on.
Summary: large one is chevron shaped, smaller is a spere
